about_the_game:
PACK is a first person cleaning game where you play as a robot designed to clean up after natural disasters. The only problem is that the world has already ended – but that’s never stopped a robot from carrying out its objective. Wash, vacuum and clean out old abandoned structures while learning about the ultimate fate of mankind, alone or with friends.

Washing

The handy washer is used to wash away various grimes, stains or even blood. While the washer can be used to push objects around, there are better tools for that job.

Vacuuming

The vacuum is used to suck up small items as well as surface materials like leaves and papers. The vacuum, however, has a capacity limit. When the vacuum becomes full you will generate a trash cube that will need to be picked up and disposed of.

Disposal

The graspers are used to pick up and dispose of trash cubes and other trash objects too big for the vacuum. You can also pick up and reorganize objects in the environment.

Key Features

  • Clean dirt and grime using the spray washer

  • Remove litter using the vacuum and generate trash cubes for easy disposal

  • Pickup and dispose of debris and trash cubes

  • Clean and restore multiple levels

  • Uncover story elements

  • Play with up to 3 friends in multiplayer mode

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64-bit) or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-760 (4*2800), AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760, AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 12
